title: pkgdown template for DataSHIELD community packages
text: dstemplate provides custom pkgdown template DataSHIELD community packages. template based tidytemplate created RStudio.

title: pkgdown template for DataSHIELD community packages
text: Add YAML file author fields Please note information consistent DESCRIPTION file package. E.g.:
code: authors:   Escribà-Montagut Xavier:     href: https://github.com/ESCRI11 Authors@R: c(     person("Escribà-Montagut", "Xavier", , "xavier.escriba@isglobal.org", role = c("aut", "cre"))   )

title: pkgdown template for DataSHIELD community packages
text: Update template file information authors field.

title: pkgdown template for DataSHIELD community packages
text: ’re building site using GitHub actions similar tool (local), ’ll need installed datashield/dstemplate. Please using remotes::install_github('datashield/dstemplate').
